name: Christoph Lipp
bio: The syntax is slightly ruby-ish and quite easy to grasp. But it truly is stading on the shoulders of giants (Erlang / OTP) which makes it my go to language for most new projects.

name: Todd Resudek
bio: I am happy to help. I have been working professionally in Elixir since January 2018 and have presented at Empex, ElixirDaze, and ElixirConf 2018.
